allow:
Bash(echo "# Server Configuration
PORT=5000
NODE_ENV=development

# Database Configuration
DB_HOST=localhost
DB_PORT=5432
DB_NAME=callflow_db
DB_USER=postgres
DB_PASSWORD=your_postgres_password_here

# JWT Secret
JWT_SECRET=callflow_secret_key_2024_change_in_production
JWT_EXPIRES_IN=7d

# CORS
CORS_ORIGIN=http://localhost:3000

# File Upload
MAX_FILE_SIZE=50000000
UPLOAD_PATH=./uploads")
